events.name: Azusa Beautiful ·       Saturday, December 16, 9 am to 11 am, Adopt a HWY 39 Clean-up
events.description:
Saturday, August 26, from 8 am to 10 am
Our next Adopt-a-Highway clean-up is on Saturday, August 26, from 8 am to 10 am.  We'll be picking litter along Hwy 39, which also aligns with the bike trail. We'll be meeting at the bike trail parking lot, and supplies will be provided. Please note that volunteers must be 16 years or older to participate in this project.  NOTE:  We are meeting at 8 am to beat the summer heat!  

We also need two volunteers that can help with check-in and staff the booth while the team heads out to clean.  If you're interested in volunteering for this, please let me know.

If you're able to join us please sign up here https://www.eventbrite.com/e/azusa-beautiful-adopt-a-hwy-clean-up-tickets-699423262807?aff=oddtdtcreator

Calendar of Upcoming Clean-ups & Events
Below please find our calendar for the remainder of the year.  Please note we'll be updating it periodically and will share it with you.  


SEPTEMBER

·       Saturday, September 9, 8 am to 10 am, Adopt a HWY 39 Clean-up

·       Saturday, September 16, 8 am to 10 am, Tree planting

·       Saturday, September 23, 8 am to 10 am, Adopt a HWY 39 Clean up

OCTOBER

·       Saturday, October 7, 8 am to 10 am, Adopt a HWY 39 Clean-up

·       Saturday, October 14, 12 pm to 4 pm, Golden Days Event -more details soon

·       Saturday, October 28, 8 am to 10 am, Adopt a HWY 39 Clean-up

NOVEMBER

·       Saturday, November 4, 9 am to 11 am, Adopt a HWY 39 Clean-up

·       Saturday, November 18, 9 am to 11 am, Adopt a HWY 39 Clean-up

DECEMBER

·       Saturday, December 2, 9 am to 11 am, Adopt a HWY 39 Clean-up

·       Holiday Home Decoration Contest

·       Saturday, December 16, 9 am to 11 am, Adopt a HWY 39 Clean-up

events.name: Rubio Canyon Trail Work
events.description: Beginners welcome. The group meets every other Saturday at 8AM in Altadena. See here for more details https://www.signupgenius.com/go/10c0f4aabae2ba4ffc61-volunteer2

events.name: San Gabriel Mountains Trailbuilders
events.description: The San Gabriel Mountains Trailbuilders work the 1st, 3rd, and 5th Saturday of every month, and we work special projects which are not scheduled. Please email us to get on to the mailinglist to keep informed about scheduled and special projects! Email Ben atbwootenwhite@hotmail.com
